architectural_notes: Deployment supports versioned releases with rollback capability (e.g., rollback from v100 to v99 across both frontend and backend).
known_issues: User requested rollback from v100 to v99 due to too many changes in v100; rollback should apply to both frontend and backend.

existing_features.title: Revert the deployed application behavior to match version 99 across both frontend and backend, undoing the changes introduced in version 100.
Remove or disable the version 100 admin auto-bootstrap flow so that the app no longer automatically attempts to claim admin rights after Internet Identity login (restore version 99 behavior).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove or disable the backend method that was added in version 100 to allow the current caller to become an admin (restore version 99 behavior).

projectName: Roll back frontend and backend to version 99 behavior
